data.title: Giant SnowGlobe® Hire
data.meta_description: JBL Giant Snow globes are a unique attraction available to buy or hire at ANY time of the year. Invented and patented in 2007, our globes have become a popular choice for events in need of an eye catching centrepiece which will leave your guests/visitors with plenty to tell their friends about
data.text:
We all remember miniature snow globes which shook snow onto any tiny landscape. You can now bring this nostalgic piece of magic into stunning life-size reality.

JBL Giant Snow globes are a unique attraction available to buy or hire at ANY time of the year. Invented and patented in 2007, our globes have become a popular choice for events in need of an eye catching centrepiece which will leave your guests/visitors with plenty to tell their friends about.

Our globes are an obvious choice for any Christmas or Winter Wonderland themed event or attraction, but the adaptability and bespoke element to this show stopping stunner means that you can make them fit into any theme.

With 8 different size options and short term hire option as well as the fact it sets up in as little as 10 minutes, the excellent price point makes this a ‘no-brainer’!
